compact_lines: - Left/Right switches topic. Up/Down switches dimension.

compact_lines: - Use Full Key Map topic for complete live key coverage.
- See Scoring topic for points and bonus rules.
full_lines: - Challenge mode prefills lower layers to raise early-game pressure.
- Exploration mode disables gravity/locking/clears for practice.
- Dry-run checks whether a selected setup can clear layers.

compact_lines: - Final points = round((base + bonuses) * score multiplier).
- Leaderboard ranks by score, then lines, then speed.
full_lines: - Multiplier reflects bot mode, grid mode, and speed level.
- Fields include score, cleared lines/layers, speed progression, and duration.

compact_lines: - HELPER: only lines intersecting active piece cells.
- Locked-cell transparency affects board cells already on the board (including challenge layers and landed pieces).
full_lines: - HELPER: only lines intersecting active piece cells.
- Applies to locked board cells only (challenge layers + landed pieces).
- Range is 0%-85%; default is 25% from Settings > Display.
- In-game adjust uses camera transparency keybinds (shown in side panel controls).
- 4D is shown as multiple 3D boards (one per W layer).

compact_lines: - Play 2D / Play 3D / Play 4D / Help / Leaderboard / Settings / Keybindings / Bot Options / Quit
- Pause menu keeps Help/Settings/Keybindings/Bot options parity.
full_lines: - Play 2D / Play 3D / Play 4D / Help / Leaderboard / Settings / Keybindings / Bot Options / Quit
- Rows show action, key(s), and action description.
- Pause includes Help, Leaderboard, Settings, Keybindings, Bot Options, Restart, and Quit.

compact_lines: - Re-open Keybindings Setup if controls feel inconsistent.
- Use explicit Save when you want a durable checkpoint.
- Use Edge/OFF grid if visuals feel crowded.
